about_the_game:
This DLC is playable in Taiko no Tatsujin: Rhythm Festival game modes like Taiko Mode, Great Drum Toy War and Run! Ninja Dojo.

Anime Pack Vol. 3
- Song: Genesis of AQUARION
Easy ★3, Normal ★4, Hard ★5, Extreme ★7
- Song: Netsujo no Spectrum
Easy ★3, Normal ★4, Hard ★5, Extreme ★8
- Song: Detective Conan, main theme
Easy ★3, Normal ★1, Hard ★5, Extreme ★6
- Song: Uso
Easy ★3, Normal ★5, Hard ★5, Extreme ★6

*The songs included in this product may also be available in the Taiko Music Pass.
